title: SET_MP_GAMER_TAG_COLOUR
content:
0x613ED644950626AE0x7E3AA40A// SetMpGamerTagColour
void SET_MP_GAMER_TAG_COLOUR(int gamerTagId, int component, int hudColorIndex);Parameters:gamerTagId: a gamerTagId obtained using  for example: CREATE_FAKE_MP_GAMER_TAG.component: a component id, see the full list here: linkhudColorIndex: a hud color index, see the full list here: linkSets a gamer tag's component colourExamples:LuaC#local playerPed = PlayerPedId() --get our players ped
local playerName = GetPlayerName(PlayerId()) --get our players name
local gamerTagId = CreateFakeMpGamerTag(playerPed, playerName, 0, 0, "", 0) --create a gamer tag
SetMpGamerTagColour(gamerTagId, 0, 129) --set component 0(GAMER_NAME) color to 129(HUD_COLOUR_YOGA)
